title: Factoring Rules
text: Remember the acronym, FOIL, which says to multiply the First, Outer, Inner, and Last terms to multiply the two expressions.
speech: Remember the acronym, FOIL, which says to multiply the First, Outer, Inner, and Last terms to multiply the two expressions.

title: Factoring Rules
text: What will our expression look like after using FOIL?

title: Squaring i
text: If $$i^2=-1$$, what will $$15+9i \sqrt{3}-10i \sqrt{3}-18i^2$$ be when we simplify i?
speech: If  i squared is equal to negative 1 , what will  15, plus, 9 i the square root of 3 minus, 10 i the square root of 3 minus 18 i squared  be when we simplify i?

, what will   15, plus, 9 i the square root of 3 minus, 10 i the square root of 3 minus 18 i squared

title: Like Terms
text: Combining like terms in $$15+9i \sqrt{3}-10i \sqrt{3}+18$$, what do we get?

title: Solution
text: What will our final expression be after simplifying?
